about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a full stack developer with experience in modern web technologies.
about.texte:
With solid experience in team management, I spent 5 years at John Paul leading a team of 7 concierges. During that time, I built the team from the ground up, implementing full coaching, onboarding, continuous training, and personalized support processes—developing advanced skills in leadership and talent development.

In parallel, since 2018, I have founded and run my digital marketing agency, MDMC Music Ads. We support over 100 clients in building their strategy and growing their online fanbase.

Our digital expertise has produced tangible results: over 1,500 campaigns launched, 34 million cumulative views, and solid engagement rates between 4 and 8%. My specialty: turning attention into a loyal, active community.

Today, I apply this dual expertise—managerial and digital, data-driven and results-oriented—to help structure your teams and grow your project.

tachfin.name: Tachfin Khelil
tachfin.title: Site Director – John Paul, Lisbon
tachfin.text: As site director at John Paul Lisbon, I had the pleasure of working with Denis ADAM, whose dedication, rigor, and versatility greatly contributed to the quality of our premium service. He structured and strengthened our night concierge team, while showing strong crisis management and customer experience skills. Proactive, resilient, and always solution-oriented, Denis earned the trust of clients and colleagues alike. I highly recommend him for any position requiring leadership, adaptability, and excellence in relationships.
